scripts.build-alpha: addon versioning --semver prerelease --tag alpha && npm run build
scripts.build-patch: addon versioning --semver patch && npm run build
scripts.build-minor: addon versioning --semver minor && npm run build
scripts.build-major: addon versioning --semver major && npm run build
scripts.build-pack-copy-chrome: npm run build && addon package && cp -r ./.dist/*.zip /mnt/chromeos/MyFiles/Downloads/shared/
scripts.build-pack-copy-win: npm run build && addon package && copy /Y .\.dist\*.zip .\..\
scripts.build-install-copy: npm run build && addon install && rm -rf /mnt/chromeos/MyFiles/Downloads/shared/script.module.AEL || true && cp -r /home/cwjungerius/projects/addons/script.module.AEL /mnt/chromeos/MyFiles/Downloads/shared/
